changeSet.author: john
changeSet.sql: create function text_array_to_string(text[], text, text) returns text as $$ select array_to_string($1, $2, $3) $$ language sql cost 1 immutable;

changeSet.author: johnb
johnb
changeSet.sql:
create table ebooks.books ( book_id uuid primary key default uuid_generate_v4(), collection_id uuid not null references ebooks.collections (collection_id), name text not null, title text not null, authors text[] not null default '{}', path text not null, contents text[] not null default '{}', page_count int,
constraint unq_ebooks_collection_id_path unique (collection_id, path) );

changeSet.author: john
changeSet.sql: create index idx_ts_title on ebooks.books using gin (to_tsvector('english', title));

changeSet.author: john
changeSet.sql: create index idx_ts_contents on ebooks.books using gin (to_tsvector('english', text_array_to_string(contents, ' ', ' ')));

changeSet.author: john
changeSet.sql:
create table ebooks.lists ( list_id uuid primary key default uuid_generate_v4(), name text not null, created_at timestamp with time zone default now(), updated_at timestamp with time zone default now(),
constraint unq_list_name unique (name) )

changeSet.author: john
changeSet.sql:
create table ebooks.list_entries ( list_entry_id serial primary key, list_id uuid not null references ebooks.lists (list_id), book_id uuid not null references ebooks.books (book_id), created_at timestamp with time zone default now(), updated_at timestamp with time zone default now(),
constraint unq_list_entry unique (list_id, book_id) )
